channel.title: Blog on Mean,Median&Me
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Mean,Median&Me

item.title: Movie Runtimes
item.description: Last year, Vanity Fair published an article comparing the top twenty US box office performers of 2022 to those of 2002. They found that, on average, the 2022 films were 13 minutes longer than the 2002 films. Maybe those years seem arbitrarily chosen, and the twenty movie sample size is a little small for your taste, but to me the statistic is a nice illustration of how popular movies may have changed over a twenty-year period.
